title: e-fsr-c14001-01
text: Ref : <dış yazışma no> Subject: English Language Assessment Exam Istanbul, Turkey <date> Mr./Ms. < applicant’s name> < address> < address> Dear Mr./Ms.<last name>, You are requested to take the English Language Assessment Exam the details given below, to be able to continue your studies at Sabancı University for <…………..> Academic Year. Exam Date: <sınav tarihi> Start Time : <sınav saati> Place of examination : <bina adı> Building <sınıf no.> For the identification check to be done in time, we ask that students who will take the exam be at the exam hall half an hour before the exam starts and that they bring some official identification which includes their photograph (such as a passport, identification card, driver’s license) with them. Sincerely <>………Ad Soyad……….. <> Director of Student Resources Copy: Directorate of School of Languages FSR-C14001-01
